#!/bin/bash
ExtensionVersion="" if [ -f /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/Current/Resources/Info.plist ] then ExtensionVersion=$(defaults read /Library/Frameworks/R.framework/Versions/Current/Resources/Info.plist CFBundleVersion) fi
if [ "$ExtensionVersion" == "" ] then ExtensionVersion="Not Installed" fi
echo "<result>$ExtensionVersion</result>"
exit 0
